text: Then Jesus said, “Who touched me?” When everyone denied it, Peter 8:45 and those who were with him ¦ --- NA SBL WHand those who were with him said, “Master, the crowds are surrounding yoʋ and pressing against 8:45 yoʋ, and yet yoʋ say, ‘Who touched me?’ ¦ yoʋ. CTyoʋ, and yet yoʋ say, ‘Who touched me?’ ”
